snippet: BELFER--Norman C.,of Palm Beach, FL, formerly of Great Neck, NY passed away peacefully on May 3, 2016. His 93 years captured the beauty, joy and tragedy of our time. Norman rebuilt a life shattered by the Holocaust, focused on his wife of 64 years, Elinor; his four children, Andrew and his wife Karen, James (of blessed memory), Lauren and Carolyn and her husband Jonathan; and his seven grandchildren, James, Jason, Adam, David, Samantha, Jennifer and Jordan. Norman was a brilliant businessman and a master builder of significant real estate projects in five states, a generous philanthropist and a man of great strength and character. He faced monumental challenges with a calm, optimistic, loving, forgiving and humble spirit. He touched the lives of many and will be sorely missed. Donations in his memory may be made to the American Society for Yad Vashem and the American Technion Society. Funeral service was held on Friday, May 6, in Great Neck, NY. 1/3
